Reviews.Title: Above Expectations
Reviews.Author: Joey Ketcham
Reviews.Content: I've waited a long time to upgrade to a new camera, and this was the perfect bundle and couldn't be happier with this purchase. Obviously the camera is very nice, but the accessories that came with it are a must have. I ordered this on a Thursday, had it the next day. Very satisfied with this and highly recommend to anyone wanting to purchase a Canon T4i bundle kit.

Reviews.Title: Very good and complete
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Ramirez Duran
Reviews.Content: I must say that I got full kit, missed none of the purchased devices, as soon as a camera in my work complies to perfection in quality and I can make in my social activities the best works to deliver to my clients. Congratulations to the proveesor your responsibility. Thank you.

KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T4i Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<4> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <5> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <6> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <8> Zeikos DSLR Sling Backpack + <9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T4i Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Tripod + Battery + Backpack + Filters + Remote + Telephoto & Wide-Angle Lenses + Accessory Kit
